TopicTitle: Some words about the new main website

Articles.Content:
Everyone is so focused on the update itself, but I thought I'd send some recognition over to aLeXmOrA, who did a fantastic job on the new website. It just looks so shiny and awesome now!

And that's all I really had to say on the matter. Does anybody else agree?

Yeah! I love it. Well done aLeXmOrA!

As more people start to become interested in KSP, they will want to check out the website, and streamlining things visually is always a good way to welcome new players.
I agree, it looks quite pleasing, very "Web 3.0".
Very true words. Well done web site design. aLeXmOrA definitely deserves a hug for it. *hug*
As long as it doesn't use that awful 3 collumn abomination that every site is loving to use nowdays, it should be fine.
Congrats,t his is far better than ky own website building, have a cookie.
